author: cms-sw
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmssw#23276

The discussion about the best possible definition for the @express sequence to be used is still ongoing, see comments to #23351 (backport to 10_1_X of @23276). Following the objections raised by the tracker community and the following discussion with @schneiml , the old version of the express sequence is temporarily restored.
title: Temporarily revert "Adapt @express sequence for T0"
